chinese: 好的. 我会告诉他你来过电话.
english: OK. I'll tell him you called.

chinese: Hey, 刚才是Lisa.
english: Hey, that was Lisa.

chinese: 她说你本来要跟她见面的.
english: She said you were supposed to meet her.

chinese: 我知道. 我是要跟她见面. 她生气了吗?
english: I know. I was. Was she mad?

chinese: 她生气了吗!
english: Was she mad!

chinese: Oh boy, 我把一切搞砸了.
english: Oh boy, I blew it.

chinese: Well, 她说她要回家, 会再给你打电话.
english: Well, she said she was going home and she'd call you later.

chinese: 发生了什么事?
english: What happened?

chinese: 我今天上午在广场拍片.
english: I taped in the Square this morning.

chinese: 然后去学校见了我的导师.
english: Then I had a meeting over at school with my advisor.

chinese: 首先, 他迟到了45分钟.
english: First of all, he was 45 minutes late.

chinese: 接着, 在我做了完整的进度报告之后, 他决定要从头开始审查整个项目.
english: Then after a complete progress report, he decides to go over the whole project from the top.

chinese: 真是讨厌!
english: What a pain!

chinese: 我当时就想起身走人.
english: I wanted to just get up and walk out.

chinese: 冷静, Michael. 他可是你的研究生导师.
english: Temper, Michael. He is your graduate advisor.

chinese: Lisa会冷静下来的.
english: Lisa will calm down.

chinese: 你只需稍微表示表示就能补救这一切.
english: It's nothing a little gesture on your part won't fix.

chinese: 向她求婚吧.
english: Ask her to marry you.

chinese: 别走极端.
english: Let's not go to extremes.

chinese: 向她保证再也不会发生这种事.
english: Tell her it'll never happen again.

chinese: 我上次就跟她这么说过了.
english: I told her that the last time.

chinese: Well well well, 你确实碰到了难题, 是吧?
english: Well well well, you do have a problem, don't you?

chinese: 我可以低声下气求她原谅.
english: I could grovel.

chinese: 这也是一个办法. 就我个人而言, 我从不低声下气求人.
english: Groveling is an option. Now, personally I don't grovel.

chinese: 我只会促使女人与我分手.
english: I just inspire women to break up with me.

chinese: 也许你应该试试低声下气.
english: Maybe you should try groveling.
